description: This file serves as the entry point for a React-based web application. It imports the React library, React DOM for rendering, a CSS stylesheet, and the main App component. It creates a root DOM node and renders the App component within React.StrictMode to help identify potential issues during development.

methods.name: createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering the React element tree into the specified DOM node.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the DOM within the created root.
